2.title: On and Off and Kaboom!
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Brad is a down and down sales guy just trying to keep his job and not doing a great job at it. Every month, the sales reps are forced to attend the monthly sales meeting where they are made to feel like they are under performing and under producing all while getting laughed at by the boss. The sales reps are also provided with a new product to sell for the month. This month's product is called Dazzle, it is a spray to shine chrome and chrome only. Not paying attention, Brad takes the new product out to his first car lot and attempts to spray the whole car to give it a new car shine. When the product ruins the paint on the car in front of the car's owner, Brad is forced to gather his things and run for his life.
imdb.title: Sales Force
plot: After another long sales meeting, Brad attempts to open a new account to keep his job as an outside salesman. Not paying attention to how the product of the month is applied, he creates a big mess that he must literally run away from.::Production Company
